sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Supply Chain Purchase Orders GLOBAL">5570d97adb933200a48b55d0cf96196b</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:a54bd1fedb933200a48b55d0cf9619e4</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Makes numeric Capex</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {  
  
  if (isLoading || newValue === '') {  
  return;  
  }  
  var result = formatNumber(newValue);  
  if(result == false){  
     alert('Only numeric values allowed');  
     return;  
  
  }  
//    // To avoid recusrion  
//   if(result != newValue){  
//     // Change u_field_name to the field on which this onChange script is applied  
//     g_form.setDisplayValue('u_captial_requested', formatNumber(newValue));  
  
//   }  
}  
function formatNumber(x) {  
  // Regular expression allowing only numeric values  
  var reg = /^[\d,]+$/;  
  if(!x.match(reg))  
    return false;  
  else  
    return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");  // Insert commas at correct position  
  }  ]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-06-19 11:12:13</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>384bcd08db633200a48b55d0cf96193f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Makes numeric Capex</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_384bcd08db633200a48b55d0cf96193f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-06-19 12:33:46</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Supply Chain Purchase Orders GLOBAL">5570d97adb933200a48b55d0cf96196b</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:878b91fedb933200a48b55d0cf961966</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Makes numeric Revex</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {  
  
  if (isLoading || newValue === '') {  
  return;  
  }  
  var result = formatNumber(newValue);  
  if(result == false){  
     alert('Only numeric values allowed');  
     return;  
  
  }  
//    // To avoid recusrion  
//   if(result != newValue){  
//     // Change u_field_name to the field on which this onChange script is applied  
//     g_form.setDisplayValue('u_captial_requested', formatNumber(newValue));  
  
//   }  
}  
function formatNumber(x) {  
  // Regular expression allowing only numeric values  
  var reg = /^[\d,]+$/;  
  if(!x.match(reg))  
    return false;  
  else  
    return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");  // Insert commas at correct position  
  }  ]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-06-19 11:12:33</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1b8b89c0db633200a48b55d0cf96199f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Makes numeric Revex</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1b8b89c0db633200a48b55d0cf96199f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-06-19 12:40:08</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_cat_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_cat_item">sys_idSTARTSWITH8b805d7adb933200a48b55d0cf961945^EQ<item endquery="false" field="sys_id" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="STARTSWITH" or="false" value="8b805d7adb933200a48b55d0cf961945"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Check Attachment</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
 
  var att = new GlideAggregate('sys_attachment');
  att.addAggregate('COUNT');
  att.addQuery('table_name', current.getTableName());
  att.addQuery('table_sys_id', current.sys_id);
  att.query();
  var count = 0;
 
  if (att.next()) {
  count = att.getAggregate('COUNT');
  if (count<1) {
  gs.addInfoMessage("Please attach Attachment");
  current.setAbortAction(true);
  }
  }
 
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-06-16 11:53:15</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4587b94fdb533200a48b55d0cf96190a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check Attachment</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4587b94fdb533200a48b55d0cf96190a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-06-16 11:58:08</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4587b94fdb533200a48b55d0cf96190a"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Supply Chain Purchase Orders GLOBAL">5570d97adb933200a48b55d0cf96196b</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:984991bedb933200a48b55d0cf961986</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Supply Chain Purchase Order Options</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	
	
	if (newValue === 'Capital'){
		g_form.clearOptions('u_spend_detail');
		g_form.setVisible('u_spend_detail',true);
		g_form.setMandatory('u_spend_detail',true);
		g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','default','-- None --');
g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','Contract for goods or services','Contract for goods or services');
g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','Fixed Assets - Equipment Procurement','Fixed Assets - Equipment Procurement');
g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','Fixed Assets - Fixtures & Fittings','Fixed Assets - Fixtures & Fittings');
g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','Fixed Assets - IT Infrastructure','Fixed Assets - IT Infrastructure');
g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','Fixed Assets - IT Software & Licenses','Fixed Assets - IT Software & Licenses');
g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','Fixed Assets - Leasehold Improvements','Fixed Assets - Leasehold Improvements');
g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','Fixed Assets - Other','Fixed Assets - Other');
g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','Goods for Resale - One Off','Goods for Resale - One Off');
g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','Goods for Resale - Ongoing','Goods for Resale - Ongoing');
g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','Leases','Leases');
g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','PR & Marketing','PR & Marketing');
		g_form.setMandatory('complaint_sub_category',false);
		g_form.setVisible('complaint_sub_category',false);
	}
	
	if (newValue === 'Structure'){
		g_form.clearOptions('u_spend_detail');
		g_form.clearOptions('complaint_sub_category');
		g_form.setVisible('u_spend_detail',true);
		g_form.setMandatory('u_spend_detail',true);
//		g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','default','-- None --');
		g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','FTE Change Request','FTE Change Request');
		g_form.setMandatory('complaint_sub_category',true);
		g_form.setVisible('complaint_sub_category',true);
	}
	
	if (newValue === 'Contracts'){
		g_form.clearOptions('u_spend_detail');
		g_form.setVisible('u_spend_detail',true);
		g_form.setMandatory('u_spend_detail',true);
	//	g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','default','-- None --');
		g_form.addOption('u_spend_detail','Contract Request','Contract Request');
		g_form.setMandatory('complaint_sub_category',true);
		g_form.setVisible('complaint_sub_category',true);
		g_form.clearOptions('complaint_sub_category');
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-06-16 10:00:56</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3dfdd143db533200a48b55d0cf9619f4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Supply Chain Purchase Order Options</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_3dfdd143db533200a48b55d0cf9619f4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-06-16 12:31:00</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
